meanings.definition: A pre-designed format used as a guide for creating something new.
meanings.sent1: I used a template to make my project look neat and organized.
meanings.sent2: The teacher provided a template for us to follow when writing our essays.
meanings.sent3: It was funny when my brother tried to use the template for his homework but got confused.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a template, guiding her through the art project effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The template made the task so much easier to understand and complete.

meanings.definition: A pattern or mold used for shaping something.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used a template to cut the wood into the right shape.
meanings.sent2: The dressmaker traced the template onto the fabric before sewing.
meanings.sent3: The cookie dough stuck to the template, making funny shapes when baked.
meanings.sent4: His strict routine was a template for success in his daily tasks.
meanings.sent5: The template ensured that each piece was identical in size and shape.

meanings.definition: A model or example that can be copied or adapted.
meanings.sent1: The recipe was a template for making delicious cookies.
meanings.sent2: She used her mother's career as a template for her own aspirations.
meanings.sent3: The old house served as a template for the new one they were building.
meanings.sent4: His speech was a template for future presentations on the topic.
meanings.sent5: The success story became a template for others to follow in their own journeys.
